name: Bangalore Racers
description:
On your mark... Get.. set. GO! This adrenaline filled racing game will have you racing through the treacherous streets of Bangalore in India.
Use your reflexes to avoid motorcycles, elephants and stray pedestrians which come at you in an endless series of chaotic waves across 14 different levels.
Do you have what it takes to get first place in the rally racing madness that is Bangalore?!

Welcome To India!
